name: Rayman 2 VR Remake
description:
IMPORTANT: This is a FAN MADE Rayman game. If they will ask me to take it down I will do so immediatly. Do not try to donate me in any way or buy Rayman 2 instead.

Did you always want to see the Woods Of Light through Rayman's eyes? Wanted to helicopter your hear and shoot lums from your own hands? Now you can in Rayman 2 VR! A recreation of Rayman 2 movement in original Rayman 2 levels!

PS: This is only a test. The level cannot be completed. If there is interest in some more content I might continue.
